data.title: Lexington Area Community Foundation Endowment Fund
data.meta_description: The Foundation brings together charitable donors, community leaders and nonprofit organizations to make positive impacts in North Carolina.
data.text:
The Lexington Area Community Foundation was established in 1996 to encourage charitable giving within the local community. Its mission is to bring together donors, community leaders and nonprofits to make positive impacts throughout Lexington, N.C.

The volunteer board of advisors have awarded more than $165,000 to local nonprofits over the last five years to support projects that enhance lives and improve the community.

View Recent Grants

You can help Lexington Area Community Foundation reach more local charities with larger grants by making a gift to the endowment. Your gift will support the principal balance of the endowment, which – over time – will increase the annual amount available to be granted to the community for years to come.

If you would like to make your gift available for grantmaking now to benefit the community, please write “spendable contribution” in the “Leave a comment” section.
